Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},

We are pleased to offer you the position of {{ doc.designation}} subsequent to your selection in our Heating Ventilation & Mechanical Equipment department as per following terms and conditions.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%}
{{ row.offer_term }} : {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
  • This offer will not be valid if you are found medically unfit for the job required.
  • This offer is subject to a background verification and can be recalled at any point in time post issuance of the offer.
  • Your appointment shall be subject to obtaining necessary labour clearance and visa, as per the existing immigration rules of the Sultanate of Oman.
  • Your employment with Al Ansari Group will be subject to the rules and regulations of the company.
  • All other terms which are not listed in this agreement shall be governed by Oman labour law.
  • In the event of acceptance of this offer, please furnish the following immediately to us for processing your visa formalities:
  1. Two copies of your valid passport.
  2. Ten copies of passport size photographs (blue background).
  3. Medical certificate from the Authorized Medical center (original with GAMCA slip).
  4. Signed acceptance of the offer and attested original Degree / Diploma certificate - Apostille attestation for Ministry of External Affairs.

Please sign the copy of this offer letter and return as token of your acceptance to the above terms.


Regards,
